flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: To believe is to love, inspire, and motivate onself! We encourage all of our reader to BELIEVE in themselves because that is where true beauty and love lies by believing in oneself.
guide.introduction_rendered: To believe is to love, inspire, and motivate onself! We encourage all of our reader to BELIEVE in themselves because that is where true beauty and love lies by believing in oneself.
guide.summary: Believe Magazine is a publication that serves to feed the aspirations and progress of the African American community. Our goal is inform, inspire, and improve the lives of readers each time our publication is released.
guide.title: Believe
